headline: Travelers Partners with Anthropic to Expand AI-Enabled Engineering and Analytics Capabilities
summary: HARTFORD, Conn., January 15, 2026--The Travelers Companies, Inc. (NYSE: TRV) and Anthropic today announced a partnership to expand Travelers’ AI-enabled engineering and analytics capabilities. Nearly 10,000 engineers, data scientists, analysts and product owners at Travelers are being empowered with Anthropic’s personalized AI assistants to enhance and accelerate software, analytics and machine learning model development.
